product_name: Swiss Army SwissLite Pocket Knife/Flashlight - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great to keep in your hiking pack or car, the Swiss Army 2-1/4-in. SwissLite Pocket Knife/Flashlight adds a powerful red LED light to its ever-popular classic model. Blade and other features are durable stainless steel. LED red-beam mini light; press logo to activate. Nail file with screwdriver tip. Scissors, tweezers and a keyring. The red LED light on the Swiss Army SwissLite Pocket Knife/Flashlight can aid with night vision and emergencies. Closeout.
short_description: Great to keep in your hiking pack or car, the Swiss Army 2-1/4-in. SwissLite Pocket Knife/Flashlight adds a powerful red LED light to its ever-popular classic model.
